name: Oblink: Cut the link!
description:
(If WebGL is taking too long to load, use the downloadable versions instead.)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a Puzzle game developed within the span of 48 hours, as participation in the GMTK (Game Maker's Toolkit) Game Jam. This took place from the 11th to the 13th of June, 2021. The theme for the Jam, was 'Joined together.' We took this theme quite literally, and linked both characters movement to each other, also making it a key mechanic and the game objective to unlink them. The name of the game 'Oblink' was a play on words between 'Oblong', and 'Link', just delineating the shape of the characters and surroundings
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Controls:
Blue Player: W, A, S, D.
Purple Player: Arrow keys.
{Note: The player you control will follow your input precisely, but the opposing color will mirror it.}
Unlink: 'Z'.
{Note: You will be able to unlink the amount of times mentioned on the top middle of your screen, which varies per level.}
Restart Level: 'R'.
